A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Complete destruction of a billion dollar franchise.  Mistakes are uncountable.
The Phantom Menace was a bad movie with bad acting and characters.
 The Force Awakens was unoriginal.  But neither BROKE Star Wars.
This movie not only was bad\, it ruined the franchise.
The people who wrote this and created it clearly never cared about the universe\, or even science fiction in general.
To make a bad movie is easy.  But to destroy a universe is quite hard.  But these people did it.  Beyond unforgivable.
